title: Ginger-Scallion Chili Sauce
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - 5 or 6 scallions, green and white parts, thinly sliced
directions: Directions:1. In a wok or frying pan over high heat, warm the oil to 260°F / 125°C on an instant-read thermometer.2. Add the chili powder, ginger, scallions, salt, and sugar and cook for 7 minutes, stirring well.3. Remove the wok from the heat and set aside to cool.4. Consume right away or transfer to an airtight container and store in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
